Trinity::

"HEY!!!!!" complaint Trinity when she was capture by the net "LET ME 
GO OUT!!! IT ISN'T NICE!!!! LET ME GO OUT!!!"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Sarge looked at trinity furiously. In one quick snap, he fired a 
net at her. Just a plain net used to restrain troublemakers.
> 
> Perplex: Hey!
> 
> Perplex cried out when Sarge fired the net at Trinity...
> 
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: airly2000@y... 
>   To: nbwrpg@y... 
>   Sent: Thursday, June 14, 2001 12:28 AM
>   Subject: Re: Sarge...
> 
> 
>   Trinity::
> 
>   "You can't scare me..." said the girl while she pretended to be 
>   fearsome but her little paws tembled "And you better not try to 
hurt 
>   my friends or I'll bite you as I bit Deemos!!!!"
> 
>   --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
>   > Perplex pulled his newly issued blaster rifle, and Zeni backed 
away 
>   from Perplex.
>   > 
>   > Perplex: Who are you?
>   > 
>   > Giant spider: I am the Sarge. Nothing more, nothing less.
>   > 
>   > Sarge saw that he scared Trinity and he transformed to robot 
mode.
>   > 
>   > Sarge: Have you seen someone by the name of Deemos? I believe 
he 
>   came to this planet. I need to execute him.
>   > 
>   > Perplex: Yeah, he came around here. He's been causing a deal of 
>   damage to us and our base.
>   > 
>   > Sarge: He has, huh? Just like him to have an army though, so I 
know 
>   he's not alone! I am correct, right?
>   > 
>   > Perplex: Yeah, he had too many with him to count. Some of our 
>   soldiers defected and joined him.
>   > 
>   > Sarge: Some great war hero he is. He's nothing more than 
>   a.....Benedict Arnold.
>   > 
>   > Perplex put the blaster rifle into subspace.
>   > 
>   > Perplex: Shall you be on your way?
>   > 
>   > Sarge: No, I shall not. In fact, I'm staying right here at your 
>   base.
>   > 
>   > Perplex: Huh?
>   > 
>   > Sarge: Deemos never attacks once. He'll always come back again 
and 
>   again until he destroys everything. I estimate that he's already 
>   attacked you twice. He always takes a breather after 2 attacks. 
He is 
>   taking a breather, right?
>   > 
>   > Perplex: Yes, he is.
>   > 
>   > Sarge: Of course. I'm going to be waiting for him here. When he 
>   returns, we need to take him out. Is that clear?
>   > 
>   > Perplex: I suppose.
>   > 
>   > Sarge: You suppose? That is no answer, mister.
>   > 
>   > Sarge looked at Trinity.
>   > 
>   > Sarge: Sorry I scared you, little girl. But I think Deemos is 
far 
>   scarier than me...
>   > 
>   > 
>   > ----- Original Message ----- 
>   >   From: airly2000@y... 
>   >   To: nbwrpg@y... 
>   >   Sent: Thursday, June 14, 2001 12:04 AM
>   >   Subject: Re: Zero
>   > 
>   > 
>   >   Trinity::
>   > 
>   >   "AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH!!!!!!" shouted scared Trinity and ran 
where 
>   >   Perplex was
>   > 
>   >   --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
>   >   > OOC: What a coincidence that Trinity doesn't like spiders, 
>   don't 
>   >   you think?
>   >   > 
>   >   > BIC: A huge, monstrous, tarantula climbs out of the ship 
and 
>   looks 
>   >   at Trinity. He is bright orange and hairy, and the scariest 
part 
>   was, 
>   >   that he was an Orange Baboon Tarantula. The most aggressive 
of 
>   all 
>   >   Tarantulas. EVER! And there he was, staring, legs pushing him 
off 
>   the 
>   >   ground like a large cage, and looking at the 3 who had left 
the 
>   >   base...
>   >   > 
>   >   >   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   >   >   From: airly2000@y... 
>   >   >   To: nbwrpg@y... 
>   >   >   Sent: Wednesday, June 13, 2001 11:44 PM
>   >   >   Subject: Re: Zero
>   >   > 
>   >   > 
>   >   >   Trinity:
>   >   > 
>   >   >   "OK " said Trinity and she ran towards the ship, she 
tapped 
>   the 
>   >   >   ship's door and said "Helloooo, come outside and say 
helloooo"
>   >   > 
>   >   >   --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> 
wrote:
>   >   >   > Perplex: Fine with me, Trinity. But be careful.
>   >   >   > 
>   >   >   > Perplex walked outside of the base and Zeni followed 
him. 
>   >   Perplex 
>   >   >   walked slowly towards the opened up ship.
>   >   >   > 
>   >   >   > Perplex: Hello?...
>   >   >   > 
>   >   >   >   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   >   >   >   From: airly2000@y... 
>   >   >   >   To: nbwrpg@y... 
>   >   >   >   Sent: Wednesday, June 13, 2001 11:11 PM
>   >   >   >   Subject: Re: Zero
>   >   >   > 
>   >   >   > 
>   >   >   >   Trinity:
>   >   >   > 
>   >   >   >   "Hey pals can I go with you???" said Trinity while 
she 
>   ran 
>   >   >   towards 
>   >   >   >   the exit...
>   >   >   > 
>   >   >   >   --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> 
>   wrote:
>   >   >   >   > A whistling noise was heard outside. Anyone who 
could 
>   hear 
>   >   must 
>   >   >   >   have heard
>   >   >   >   > it, it was extremely loud and ear piercing. It 
crashed 
>   >   right 
>   >   >   >   outside the
>   >   >   >   > Chivtron base with a huge thud, just mere feet from 
the 
>   >   front 
>   >   >   door. 
>   >   >   >   The
>   >   >   >   > driver of this tiny ship, which is what the object 
is, 
>   is a 
>   >   >   very 
>   >   >   >   good one.
>   >   >   >   > 
>   >   >   >   > Arrow: Well, here I was thinking we'd survive. I 
guess 
>   I 
>   >   was 
>   >   >   wrong.
>   >   >   >   > 
>   >   >   >   > Arrow walked off into another room.
>   >   >   >   > 
>   >   >   >   > Perplex: Well, maybe it's peaceful.
>   >   >   >   > 
>   >   >   >   > Perplex was afraid, though. Zeni walked up to the 
front 
>   >   door.
>   >   >   >   > 
>   >   >   >   > Zeni: Can I go out and see what it is?
>   >   >   >   > 
>   >   >   >   > Perplex: Hold on one minute. Arrow. We might need 
you.
>   >   >   >   > 
>   >   >   >   > Arrow did not come back, however. Then a voice was 
>   heard. 
>   >   It 
>   >   >   must 
>   >   >   >   have been
>   >   >   >   > heard, he was yelling at the top of his lungs.
>   >   >   >   > 
>   >   >   >   > Voice: Why do people put asteroids in the way! I 
don't 
>   >   deserve 
>   >   >   >   that! I am
>   >   >   >   > better than that! And who put this ship in the way! 
>   Damn it 
>   >   all 
>   >   >   to 
>   >   >   >   hell!
>   >   >   >   > 
>   >   >   >   > The ship opened...
